price: However, I let these [Makkans] and their forefathers[10] enjoy their lives, until there came to them the truth and a clear messenger[11].
arabic: بَلۡ مَتَّعۡتُ هَٰٓؤُلَآءِ وَءَابَآءَهُمۡ حَتَّىٰ جَآءَهُمُ ٱلۡحَقُّ وَرَسُولٞ مُّبِينٞ
footnotes:
[10] i.e., the descendants of Abraham (ﷺ).
 [11] i.e., Prophet Muhammad (ﷺ).

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
